item.title: Spring 的 RestTemplate 使用
item.description: 设置各种 timeout @Bean public RestTemplate restTemplate() { RestTemplate restTemplate = new RestTemplate(getClientHttpRequestFactory()); restTemplate.getMessageConverters().add(new FormHttpMessageConverter()); restTemplate.getMessageConverters().add(new MappingJackson2HttpMessageConverter()); log.info("message converters {}", restTemplate.getMessageConverters()); return restTemplate; } private ClientHttpRequestFactory getClientHttpRequestFactory() {
